alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:56PM CDT until July 05 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL KIOWA COUNTY... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Hobart, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hobart. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
